abstract: Screenwriters Scott Neustadter and Michael H Weber will pen film adaptation of John Green novel Looking for Alaska; pair has previously adapted two other novels by Green.
lead_paragraph: The screenwriters Scott Neustadter and Michael H. Weber have signed on to write the adaptation of John Green’s debut novel, “Looking for Alaska.”

headline.main: ‘Fault in Our Stars’ Team to Adapt Another Novel
headline.print_headline: ‘Fault in Our Stars’ Team to Adapt Another Novel

snippet: The screenwriters Scott Neustadter and Michael H. Weber have signed on to write the adaptation of John Green’s debut novel, “Looking for Alaska.”
